00085    // Inline methods

00087    inline bool BinaryFileIArchive::is_saving()
00088    {  return false; }

00091    {  return true; }

00093    // Inline non-static methods
00094 
00095    /*
00096    * Write one object.
00097    */
00098    template <typename T>
00099    inline BinaryFileIArchive& BinaryFileIArchive::operator & (T& data)
00100    {  
00101       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00102       return *this;
00103    }
00104 
00105    /*
00106    * Write one object.
00107    */
00108    template <typename T>
00109    inline BinaryFileIArchive& BinaryFileIArchive::operator >> (T& data)
00110    {   
00111       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00112       return *this;
00113    }

00115    // Method templates
00116 
00117    /*
00118    * Bitwise unpack a single object of type T.
00119    */
00120    template <typename T>
00121    inline void BinaryFileIArchive::unpack(T& data)
00122    {  istreamPtr_->read( (char*)(&data), sizeof(T) ); }
00123 
00124    /*
00125    * Bitwise unpack a C-array of objects of type T.
00126    */
00127    template <typename T>
00128    inline void BinaryFileIArchive::unpack(T* array, int n)
00129    {
00130       for (int i=0; i < n; ++i) {
00131          istreamPtr_->read( (char*)(&array[i]), sizeof(T));
00132       }
00133    }
00134 
00135    // Explicit serialize functions for primitive types

00140    template <>
00141    inline void serialize(BinaryFileIArchive& ar, bool& data, 
00142                          const unsigned int version)
00143    {  ar.unpack(data); }
